contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Nanny Training Academy Obtains ISO Certification

childMarkdownRemark.html: Qatar Nanny Training Academy (QNTA), a member of Qatar Foundation, has been recognized by a world leader in testing, inspection, and certification services for the excellence of its training program.

QNTA has received ISO 9001:2015 certification by the Bureau Veritas International DOHA L.L.C. for its continuous improvement in recruiting, enrolling, and training nannies, as well as implementing best practices and applying quality standards to its procedures.

By obtaining this certification, QNTA has advanced its goal of maintaining and further improving the quality of nanny training in Qatar. It celebrated this achievement at a ceremony attended by Ms. Hessa Al Mansoori, Managing Director of QNTA, its staff and employees, and officials from Bureau Veritas International DOHA L.L.C. During the ceremony, Ms. Al Mansoori received the ISO certificate from Mr. Selim Kseib, Country Chief Executive of Bureau Veritas Qatar. Ms. Al Mansoori also presented the commemorative shield of QNTA to the representative of the international organization.

Ms. Al Mansoori said: "Obtaining the ISO 9001:2015 certification of Quality Management System demonstrates our commitment to implementing the highest quality practices at QNTA."

"This certificate not only recognizes the quality of the management of procedures at QNTA, but also represents an important step in the Academy’s plans to attain international accreditation for its approach and curriculum. Such international accreditation will preserve this project’s rights as a pioneer project, and open up new horizons of expansion and progress for it." Mr. Kseib said: "On behalf of the entire team at Bureau Veritas International DOHA LLC, it is my pleasure to congratulate QNTA on this international certification. This distinctive certification truly reflects a high level of commitment and leadership by QNTA towards achieving the best international practices in management and quality systems."

pageContext.title: Qatar Nanny Training Academy Obtains ISO Certification
